definitions.definition: A change of direction or a movement downwards .
A reduction in quality or quantity .
A change in career or lifestyle to one which is not as well paid but less stressful and more personally rewarding .
A shift of a transmission into a lower gear , as dictated by heavier load on the engine, as for example when climbing a hill or strongly accelerating.

main_definition: A change of direction or a movement downwards .
secondary_definitions: A reduction in quality or quantity .
A change in career or lifestyle to one which is not as well paid but less stressful and more personally rewarding .
( automotive , cycling ) A shift of a transmission into a lower gear , as dictated by heavier load on the engine, as for example when climbing a hill or strongly accelerating.
